values: A few things to know before friending : +I'm usually only updating doodles and pchat drawings. +I love tons of stuff but am not always active in fandom! +This journal is very BoyLove friendly! +Perverted but does not always draw hardcore! +Will probably say tons of useless, dumb stuff. ;D +Loves it when you comment + By friending me here, you're agreeing to not reposting any of my art elsewhere without my approval/claiming that you drew it/trolling/etc. I'm pretty laid back and a pushover so I hope to be getting to know you all! x3 Please comment here when adding!

Reply to this post, and I'll tell you one reason why I like you. Then put this in your own journal, and spread the love.

Hey guys! I got some stuff! Some drawr stuff! The suikoden art was from a thread started by . YOU SHOULD JOIN TOO. This is from an oc session with Endy and Neku. X333 It's kind of been awhile so be nice orz; REALLY OLD OC1 ART. If you can't tell, they're Cain and Abel (badly drawn) from Starfighter haha. Something I did with a mouse at school while I waited for my maya crap to render. (It never rendered properly though!) It's Fifi and her apple she named in neku's honor lol. A Fifi turn around I did quickly...a few hours before class. I BAD GIRL. orz;;; And some more colored sketches...so um. If I offered color sketch commissions just like the one above for about 1510 dollars, would any of you be interested? ;;; Hahah. EDIT// LOL I didn't say much through this post except bombard you with art! What's wrong with meeee. Anyway, hi, how are you guys? I've been kind of busy with school...making a senior animation, in 3d...it's really kind of dumb and embarrassing so I rather not go in detail beyond that....but I've been working on that and when not doing that, wasting my time on that drawr thread because suikoden was awesome and I wasted days during my break playing it. Kind of sad I dont have time to beat it now because ENDY WHO STARTED LATER THAN ME BEAT IT ALREADY...but i'll live. /sob. I kind of need the commission monies to make up for a bad purchase (LOL YOU DONT WANT TO KNOW BUT IT'S SUIKODEN RELATED) and for a DSi...*SHOT*...AND for other stuff. Yeahhh 15 dollars per commissi--..15 dollars?! Em *fixes* I meant 10 but wrote 15, I mean 10 dollars per drawing isn't going to get me anywhere fast, but I think it's a good punishment for being dumb. *shot again* So yeah...now you have a block of text. *sobs*

My procrastination powers...they be great. (OVER 9000!!! D: No. It never gets too old!)

Today is Sunday! And I am at the lab! :D ....oh god. My brain is in a messy puddle on the floor right now...oh hay. Lookie...it's a book! ; x ; I wanna read it.

A long long time ago, a dinosaur named Megatron fell in love with a munky named Optimus, however Optimus's Father was a strict man and would not allow his daughter to wed such a hideously fur-less creature. "Why you don't even -belong- in the same time period as we do!" Cried the enraged Father Unicron. Optimus, heart broken by this, decides to become a Truck. "Then I will rather be hairless as well!" He screams and runs over his Father in a fit of rage. Megatron, who later finds out that Unicron was killed by Optimus is delighted and returns to his love's side. "Oh beloved! We can be together again!" At this the truck sobs his sorrow. "Oh Megsy. I haven't thought this through. How can we ever live together like this? I am not even an animal anymore..." Quickly drying his loves tears with promises of eternal love and return, Megatron travels far and wide so that he too may cast aside his living hide. Many years later he returns as a Jet to Optimus's side. Optimus, however, was unable to recognize Megatron through the extreme changes. "I am sorry sir, my love promised me to return to my side as a shiny truck.." "No no Optimus, I AM MEGATRON." "Such a silly person." With that Optimus walked away and their love was forever unrealized. THE END.
 I'm sorry. I was looking through the energon bar forums trying to figure out if there was anything I could do...and I ended up writing this for the guideline. SHUT UP. IT'S A WONDERFUL FORUM GUIDELINE. It's not a serious fanfiction...hopefully I write better than this. xD TEE HEE. MEGSY LOVES OPTY. ♥

Dear Endy and Suri.

Ten Top Trivia Tips about Enduro!

  1. Enduro can give birth ten days after being born, and is born pregnant!
  2. Only fifty-five percent of men wash their hands after using Enduro!
  3. Enduro can eat up to four kilograms of insects in a single night!
  4. Forty percent of the world's almonds and twenty percent of the world's peanuts are used in the manufacture of Enduro!
  5. The first American zoo was built in 1794, and contained only Enduro!
  6. It takes forty minutes to hard-boil Enduro.
  7. Devoid of her cells and proteins, Enduro has the same chemical makeup as sea water.
  8. Without Enduro, we would have to pollinate apple trees by hand.
  9. The Church of Scientology was founded in 1953, at Washington D.C., by Enduro.
  10. Enduro has four noses.
I am interested in - do tell me about

Ten Top Trivia Tips about Suri!

  1. Suri is the largest of Saturn's moons.
  2. In Ancient Egypt, people wore glittery eyeshadow made from the crushed shells of Suri.
  3. Suri can smell some things up to six miles away!
  4. Suri has three eyelids!
  5. Suri is the only metal that is liquid at room temperature.
  6. Some hotels in Las Vegas have Suri floating in their swimming pools!
  7. Banging your head against Suri uses 150 calories an hour.
  8. In 1982 Time Magazine named Suri its 'Man of the Year'.
  9. If you drop Suri from more than three metres above ground level, she will always land feet-first.
  10. The air around Suri is superheated to about five times the temperature of the sun.
